text: Seetha Kalyanam, (Seetha and Kalyan) was an Indian Malayalam television series premiered on Asianet channel on 10 September 2018. Malayalam film actress Dhanya Mary Varghese plays the titular role in the show. The show is the official remake of Telugu soap opera Lakshmi Kalyanam which aired on Star Maa. It replaced Parasparam, the longest running serial in Malayalam, which completed 1524 Episodes. ==Plot== Seetha is a maternal figure to her younger sister, Swathy, and endures all difficulties laid down by Rajeshwari to protect her sister from sorrow. Seetha and Rajeswary who is a millionaire became enemies at their first meeting itself and that day onward Rajeswary's aims to defeat and destroy Seetha. Rajeswary used dirty tricks to make seeta jobless and succeeded . At that time Seetha's sister Swathi gets pregnant by Ajay, the youngest son of Rajeswary as they are in serious relationship. Meanwhike Kalyan, the elder son falls for Seetha. ==Cast== ===Lead Cast=== * Dhanya Mary Varghese as Seetha **Sister of Sravani and Swathi *Archana Suseelan as Sravani / Saigal / Sangeetha ** Elder step-sister of Seetha and Swathi (born from Seetha's father's first marriage)[left the show] * Reneesha Rehman as Swathy ** Younger sister of Seetha and wife of Ajay * Roopa Sree as Rajeshwari Devi (Main Antagonist) **Mother of Ajay and stepmother of Kalyan * Anoop Krishnan as Kalyan **Husband of Seetha, stepson of Rajeshwari Devi and biological son of Ambikadevi and Venu * Sona Nair as Ambikadevi aka Saradananda Swamikal **Ex-wife of Venu, elder sister of Rajeshwari Devi and mother of Kalyan * Jithu Venugopal as Ajay ** Son of Rajeshwari Devi and Venu, Husband of Swathy * Anand Thrissur as Venu **Husband of Rajeshwari Devi, ex- husband of Ambika Devi and father of Kalyan and Ajay ===Recurring Cast=== *J Padmanabhan Thampi as Moorthy *Rahul Mohan as Jeyadevan *Rajmohan as Hareendra Varma *Anoop Sivasenan as Abhiram *Sini Varghese as Nayana/Shreya *Subbalakshmi as Sravani's grandmother *Amboori Jayan as Mahendran *Asha Nair as Nimmy *Haridas as Hrishikesh * Pala Aravindan as Mashammavan * Sheeji Master as D2A2 *Sreekutty as Pramila *Raima Rai as Nurse, Mashammavan's daughter *Surya Mohan as Sandra *Aparnna Nair as CI Nirmala ===Guest Appearance=== * Leena Nair as Seetha-Swathi's mother (Episode 1) * Eva as Young Seetha (Episode 1) * Baby Athmika as Young Swathy (Episode 1) * Della George as herself (Episode 11) * Pratheeksha G Pradeep as herself (Episode 11) * Haritha G Nair as herself (Episode 11) * Vindhuja Vikraman as host (Episode 11) * Rohini M Jayachandran as Anchor (Episode 33) *Mareena Michael Kurisingal as Marina in Maha episode (Episode 362) ==Awards and Reception== 12th Asianet Television Awards 2019 * Best Star Pair – Anoop and Dhanya * Performer In a Negative Role – Roopasree This is the third serial among the 5 top rated serials in Malayalam television with 4.46 million impressions (Week 05, 2019) following Vanambadi and Neelakkuyil, according to BARC India.
